document.full_text: k. j. choi was the last man standing at the players championship, winning on the first hole of sudden death with a short par putt after david toms missed his shot at par.
document.title: choi wins in playoff after 3-putt by toms
lines_and_colors: k. j. choi was the last man standing at the players championship, winning on the first hole of sudden death with a short par putt after david toms missed his shot at par.
